meanings.sent1: The taxpaid citizens were proud of contributing to their country.
meanings.sent2: She was a taxpaid worker who diligently fulfilled her civic duty.
meanings.sent3: The taxpaid group celebrated their financial responsibility with a picnic.

meanings.sent5: The taxpaid status was a badge of honor for the responsible citizens.

meanings.sent1: The taxpaid amount was deducted from his paycheck every month.
